DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this observational study is to document the glycaemic parameters, adverse events, including drug reactions, as well as hypoglycaemic episodes, in patients that switched from insulin glargine combined with oral antidiabetic drugs (OADs) to biphasic insulin aspart 30 (NovoMixÂ® 30) combined with OADs, when applicable.
DOC.brief_title: Prandial Orientated Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 Therapy - the Physiological Premix Insulin Therapy for Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
